verses.1: Pasian aw, ka dikna hong langsak inla, migilote tawh ka thu ah kei hong panpih in. Mi khemte le thutang lote kiang panin kei hong hon khia in.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hong belh Pasian na hi hi. Bang hangin kei hong nil khia na hi hiam? Galte º sukcip manin bang hangin kapin kidikdik ka hi hiam?
verses.3: Na khuavak le na thuman hong sawl khia inla, na mual siangtho, na omna ah kei hong paipihsakin, hong khasak in.
verses.4: Tua ciangin na biakna tau ah ahi a, ka lung a hong damsak Pasian kiangah ahi zongin ka pai dinga, laiza khausai lasakna tawh nang kong phat ding hi, aw Pasian, ka Pasian aw.
verses.5: Bang hangin kha kunkun a, lunghimawh niloh ka hi hiam? Pasian sungah lametna nei ning; bang hang hiam cih leh kei a hong huh ka Pasian ka phatkik ngawn ding hi.
